productDescription: Jacket from the ARISE collection. This bomber jacket has ribbed cuffs at the end of the sleeves and around the neck. The bomber has slit pockets on the front and a print on the back. Make sure to check the size guide, cause this jacket has a small fit! We recommend you to choose one or two sizes bigger than your own size if you're going for the oversized look.

optionalInfo.additionalNotes: Self development. The phoenix arises from its own ashes. A lobster outgrows its shell. A caterpillar outgrows its cocoon. We too have to step out of our comfort zone to learn. Always keep improving, re-inventing and developing ourselves. Keep searching, keep growing.
